articles.author: Riley Cardoza
articles.title: Jessica Alba’s mystery man revealed to be ‘Captain America’ star as they return from Cancún getaway - Page Six
articles.description: The actress is still navigating her divorce from estranged husband Cash Warren, with whom she shares son Hayes and daughters Honor and Haven.
articles.content:
Jessica Alba’s mystery man has been identified.
The actress was photographed with “Captain America” star Danny Ramirez as the duo headed from Cancún, Mexico, to Los Angeles on Sunday.
TMZ named the… [+2709 chars]
